text: Ruze mardoni munofiqu zanoni munofiq ʙa kasone, ki imon ovardaand, megujand: «Ba mo nigoh kuned, to az nuraton ravsani girem!» Faristagon ʙarojason tamasxurona gujand: «Ba aqiʙ ʙa dunjo ʙozgarded va az on co nur ʙitalaʙed!» Ongoh mijoni onho devore zada mesavad, ki ʙar on devor dare ʙosad, daruni on ki ru ʙa mu'minon ast rahmat ʙosadu ʙeruni on ki ru ʙa munofiqon ast, azoʙ ast
